text: At least nine isoforms of <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> have been identified due to alternative mRNA splicing , multiple gene promoters , and alternative initiation sites of translation ( Ghosh et al . , 2004 ; Ray et al . , 2006 ; Figure 2 ) .
In cancers , aberrant expression of <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> isoforms occurs frequently ( Bourdon et al . , 2005 ; Bourdon , 2007 ) .

Full-length <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> delta133p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> p53beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> are localized mainly in the nucleus , and only few of them are in cytoplasm .
<extra_id_0> p53gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> delta133p53beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> are localized in the nucleus and cytoplasm .
<extra_id_0> delta133p53gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is localized in the cytoplasm ( Bourdon et al . , 2005 ) .

Co-transfection of <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> p53beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> increases <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated apoptosis , whereas co-expression of <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> with <extra_id_0> delta133p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> suppresses <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated apoptosis ( Bourdon et al . , 2005 ) .

<extra_id_0> delta133p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> differentially regulates gene expression in <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent and - independent manners ( Aoubala et al . , 2011 ) .

Co-expression of <extra_id_0> delta133p53beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> delta133p53gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> with <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> does not affect <extra_id_0> p53 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcriptional activity on <extra_id_0> p21 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Bax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoters , as well as apoptosis .
